Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
You’re busy – fighting fires and chasing down issues consumes too much of your team’s time and focus – and it’s becoming more complex as you expand virtualization and adopt cloud services.
Rather than seeking a faster way to put out the fires, why not strive to maintain your systems and applications in a healthy state, thus preventing issues from igniting in the first place?
We have a better approach to control your virtualized environment. It’s being used by hundreds of other organizations like BT, Colgate-Palmolive, and London School of Economics to drive down costs, improve virtual workload performance and maximize resource utilization. Our Software-Defined Control system can automate the decision-making process for your IT ops team and provides intelligent actions that maintain your virtual environment in a healthy state.
But don’t just take our word for it. Check out this short overview <http://bit.ly/10cctnM> to learn how VMTurbo can help you manage the challenges brought about by virtualization. Find out how easy it can be to gain control – and put down the fire hose.
Best Regards,
